headline: Terrible News for Pfizer Stock Investors
summary: While it no longer generates the sales it once did, Pfizer's coronavirus lineup remains critical to its results.  The past three years have been challenging for Pfizer (NYSE: PFE).  Although Pfizer has made some efforts to turn things around, they have been insufficient.
